body:
Nextflix is a Netflix clone that comes with all the basic functionalities Netflix offers. Users can sign up, log in, and watch a wide variety of latest movies and TV shows.

In addition, it's also fully responsive.
Nextflix uses Nextjs for it's foundation and SSR(server side rendering), styled-components for style, framer-motion for animations, NextAuth for authentication, and MongoDB for database.

header: what can I watch on Nextflix?
body:
Due to copyright issues, you can only watch trailers of the movies or TV shows. 

Sorry about that!

Yes! Definitely! Just log in with

username: guest@nextfilx.com
password: nextflix

and try it out!

As a self-taught front-end developer who just started a few months ago, this is a perfect side project to test what I have learned and show the abilities of what I can achieve.

Hope you like it!
